data.eml:eml: Cheleionwatanabei sp. n., a new species of Stereomerini (Coleoptera, Scarabaeidae, Aphodiinae), and description of the male of C. jendeki

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kakizoe, Showtaro, Maruyama, Munetoshi, Masumoto, Kimio (2019): Cheleionwatanabei sp. n., a new species of Stereomerini (Coleoptera, Scarabaeidae, Aphodiinae), and description of the male of C. jendeki. ZooKeys 824: 45-52, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.824.31627, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.824.31627
